name: Product Management
description: We are undergraduate, graduate, and PhD students in the College of Information and Computer Sciences who are passionate about the intersection of computer science, informatics, and business and are pursuing a career in product management. We are a student community looking to educate each other on early careers in product and learn more about being a great product manager. Our year-long mission includes: book clubs, case studies, resume swaps, mock interviews, product analysis/thinking seminars, and overall building PM skills necessary for success!
